frontmatter.title: Project Structure
frontmatter.meta_title: ReactXS - UIKit for Material Design 2.0 by React Native
frontmatter.meta_description: React Native currently creates vibrant wave in mobile application development. “Write once, Run anywhere”, then you can effectively produce mobile app across all platforms including iOS & Android by one language with “Native effect”.

markdownRemark.html:
Components

  • Files locate in: src/Components
  • Common components that use for the project: Tab, Card...

Navigation

  • src/routes
    Basic routing for the app

Example

  • Files locate: src/example

  • Contain the main example that show up on the homescreen, you can refer to the example to customize for the app.
